_generated: Generated by SweetTooth, do not edit
description:
If you are using several monitor display with Gnome, 
 you may have noticed that screen position configuration
 is lost after every Gnome-Shell restart.

 This extension try to fix this issue.

Please first, check the package libxml2-utils is installed.
(Otherwise, install it with the command: sudo apt-get install libxml2-utils)

Tanks you to Nicolas Bernaerts and Keith Callenberg for the initial bash script solution.
http://bernaerts.dyndns.org/linux/74-ubuntu/309-ubuntu-dual-display-monitor-position-lost
http://www.calgorithms.com/blog/2014/07/30/fixing-multiple-monitor-position-in-ubuntu-gnome-14-dot-04/
name: fix-multi-monitors
